meanings.definition: To have one's headquarters in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The company is headquartered in the bustling city.
meanings.sent2: Many tech giants are headquartered in Silicon Valley.
meanings.sent3: The penguin humorously decided to be headquartered in the igloo next door.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were headquartered in the realm of fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The treehouse, with its tiny flag, was headquartered in the backyard, a kingdom of its own.

meanings.definition: The location of a company's main office.
meanings.sent1: The headquarters of the business is headquartered in a skyscraper.
meanings.sent2: The new headquarters will be headquartered in the downtown area.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made the tree its headquarters, headquartered high above the ground.
meanings.sent4: His mind became the headquarters, headquartered with ideas and plans.
meanings.sent5: The castle, with its grand halls, was the headquarters, headquartered on the hill, overseeing the land.
